value.title: GLOBAL MARKETS-European shares fall as investors take stock of spreading virus
value.excerpt: European stocks fell on Friday, halting their biggest ever three-day rally in a sign investors were focusing once more on the spread of the coronavirus pandemic despite hopes for further stimulus measures to combat its economic impact.
